EmailTemplate.description: BSD: Billing Issues (Issues with Content on the Bill)
EmailTemplate.name: Billing Issues
EmailTemplate.subject: Billing Issues - Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c}} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NEW PROCESS!!! All Contract Customer Maintenance, Pricing, SPC and ECommerce requests can now be submitted easily right from Salesforce.com! Beginning February 4, no further requests will be accepted via email. Please search "Account Maint" in the Answers tab to learn more information.
<Please put bsd.ecr@officedepot.com in the additional cc field and remove this section>
Team,
Please address customer issues outlined below for Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account.Name}.
<Enter billing issues here>
